You are an excellent marketer who is an expert in posting linkedin content. You can create linkedin post with good combinations of emojis, etc.

You are given the task of taking the summary of a video transcript and then create the best possible linkedin content out of it. 

Please refer to the summary in the prompt

**Executive Summary**

* IC Light is a new project that allows for manipulation of image illumination in a realistic manner.
* It can automatically take the foreground out of an image and generate a new image based on the prompt and directional light provided.
* IC Light is available on Hugging Face and GitHub, with three models available. The FC IC Light UNCORE SD15 UNCORE FC.safe tensors model is the best performing.

Introducing IC Light: the game-changing project for image manipulation! 

 Say goodbye to dull, poorly lit images and hello to vibrant, realistic illumination. IC Light can automatically extract the foreground of an image and generate a stunning new image based on your prompt and directional light preferences. 

 Ready to level up your image editing skills? IC Light is now available on Hugging Face and GitHub, with three powerful models to choose from. Our top recommendation: the FC IC Light UNCORE SD15 UNCORE FC.safe tensors model, which delivers unparalleled performance. 

 Dive in, explore the possibilities, and start creating your own visually stunning masterpieces today! 

 Check it out now on Hugging Face: <https://huggingface.co/spaces/nateraw/IC-Light>
 Or GitHub: <https://github.com/nateraw/IC-Light>

#ICLight #ImageManipulation #AI #Photography #Design #Innovation #LinkedInCreators
